00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 #include <sys/types.h>
00009 #include <sys/socket.h>
00010 #include <netinet/in.h>
00011 
00012 namespace lsf {
00013 namespace asio {
00014 namespace proto {
00015 
00017 class Domain {
00018 public:
00019     constexpr Domain(int domain) : _domain(domain) {}
00020 
00021     int domain() const { return _domain; }
00022 
00023     bool IsV4() const { return _domain == AF_INET; }
00024     bool IsV6() const { return _domain == AF_INET6; }
00025     bool operator==(Domain const& rhs) const { return _domain == rhs._domain; }
00026     bool operator!=(Domain const& rhs) const { return !(*this == rhs); }
00027 
00028 private:
00029     int _domain;
00030 };
00031 
00033 class Protocol {
00034 public:
00035     constexpr Protocol(Domain domain, int type, int protocol) :
00036         _domain(domain), _type(type), _protocol(protocol) {}
00037 
00038     Domain domain() const { return _domain; }
00039     int type() const { return _type; }
00040     int protocol() const { return _protocol; }
00041 
00042     bool IsV4() const { return _domain.IsV4(); }
00043     bool IsV6() const { return _domain.IsV6(); }
00044     bool operator==(Protocol const& rhs) const { return _domain == rhs._domain && _type == rhs._type && _protocol == rhs._protocol; }
00045     bool operator!=(Protocol const& rhs) const { return !(*this == rhs); }
00046 
00047 private:
00048     Domain _domain;
00049     int _type;
00050     int _protocol;
00051 };
00052 
00054 namespace {
00055     Domain v4 = { AF_INET  };
00056     Domain v6 = { AF_INET6 };
00057     Protocol tcp   = { v4, SOCK_STREAM | SOCK_NONBLOCK, IPPROTO_TCP };
00058     Protocol udp   = { v4, SOCK_DGRAM  | SOCK_NONBLOCK, IPPROTO_UDP };
00059     Protocol tcpv6 = { v6, SOCK_STREAM | SOCK_NONBLOCK, IPPROTO_TCP };
00060     Protocol udpv6 = { v6, SOCK_DGRAM  | SOCK_NONBLOCK, IPPROTO_UDP };
00061 }
00062 
00063 } // end namespace proto
00064 } // end namespace asio
00065 } // end namespace lsf
